result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angel M Silva

records.addlTxt:
Amended Bond Conds:
*No Discussion of Case and No Violent Contact with K. S. and the 5 Children.  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *No Weapons especially Firearms or edged weapons, except for cooking.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.

1:38 PM 
Defendant Angel M Silva in court.
Attorney Michael H. Kopp in court for Angel M Silva.
Attorney Rosa Delgado in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court Reporter:  Kimberly Keel.  Clerk:  JM.
MINUTES:
Victim rights compliance. 
Bond motion heard.
Court amends bond conds to no discussion of case and no violent contact with K. S. and the 5 children.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 09:45 am.
The 7/27/2022 Hearing has been rescheduled to 9/28/2022 due to a week long jury trial.
The 7/25/2022 Hearing has been rescheduled to 7/27/2022 at 9:45 am, at the request of the defense attorney.

State appears by Attorney Alexander Huber.   Attorney Michael H. Kopp in court for Defendant Angel M Silva.  Clerk: PT
  Court takes no action on DE's motion today as the victim does not appear.  Atty Huber states victim hasn't contacted their office and there is no safety plan in place.  Court adjourns the bond motion and today's final pretrial.  Bond continues.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 09:45 am.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
to Modify Conditions of Bond submitted by Atty Kopp
